source_sentence: 佛說德護長者經卷下
translation: Second Foshuo dehu zhangzi jing roll

source_sentence: 隋天竺三藏那連提耶舍譯
translation: Translated by the Sui Tianzang Tripiṭaka Nālandīyaśas

source_sentence: 爾時，北方過三千大千世界微塵等佛剎，有佛國土名曰炎光，佛號德藏峯奮迅王如來、多陀阿伽度、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀，現在說法。
translation: At the time, there was a buddha land in the north, 3,000 great one-thousand worlds and dusty buddha-halts, named Yama-bright, and the Buddha was called the Tathāgata, the Prasenajit King of Speed, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, and the Samantabhadra, and he was now teaching.

source_sentence: 彼佛世界有菩薩名盧舍那放大光明，復有一萬菩薩，同號盧舍那放大光明，一一菩薩各與阿僧祇菩薩以為眷屬，恭敬圍遶向娑婆世界，所經諸國放諸沈水清淨香炎，其香普熏各過十方諸佛世界、十阿僧祇倍遍滿世界，出過一切天人莊嚴，為見佛故，為供養故，為見月光童子故，為愍德護長者故來至佛所(德護，梵云尸利崛多)。
translation: In that Buddha's world there's a bodhisattva named Rocana Mahāprabhāsa, and there are another 10,000 bodhisattvas with the same name Rocana Mahāprabhāsa, each of whom is accompanied by an assembly of incalculable bodhisattvas who respectfully circumambulate the Śākya world and emit a pure fragrance of sunken water in the countries they pass through, which universally perfumes the Buddha's world in ten directions and pervades the world ten incalculable times, surpassing all the adornments of gods and humans who come to the Buddha because they want to see him, because they want to make offerings, because they want to see the Boy Moonlight, and because they want to take pity on Elder Taku (Taku, Sanskrit word for Śrīgupta).

source_sentence: 爾時，東北方過三千大千世界微塵等佛剎，有佛世界名一切寶莊嚴，佛號法自在王如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，現在說法。
translation: At the time, to the northeast, there was a buddha-world named Sarvâstivāda-rāja, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfect in Knowledge, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Trainer, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One, which was now teaching.

source_sentence: 彼有菩薩名離障礙神通，復有一萬菩薩同號離障礙，各與阿僧祇菩薩以為眷屬，恭敬圍遶向娑婆世界，所經諸國以十千萬劫清淨善根，所成就聲，讚嘆一切諸佛，興大法雲雨眾法雨至於佛所，為見佛故，為供養故，為見月光童子故，為愍德護長者故來至佛所。
translation: There was a bodhisattva named Licchavi, and there were another 10,000 bodhisattvas with the same name, Licchavi, each with an incalculable number of bodhisattvas as his followers, who respectfully surrounded him and went to the Saha world, praised all the buddhas in the countries they passed through with the sound they had accomplished with their pure and good roots over 10 million eons, and produced a great dharma cloud that rained down Dharma rain to the buddhas, came to the buddhas because they wanted to see the buddhas, made offerings, saw the Boy Moonlight, and had kindly protected the elders.

source_sentence: 爾時，東南方過三千大千世界微塵等國土，有世界名普莊嚴，彼剎有佛，號離障礙光炎如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，現在說法。
translation: At the time, there was a world named Pūrva-vara in the southeast, 3,000 great one-thousand worlds and dusty lands, and there was a Buddha there named Tathāgata Paramount, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Trainer of Men, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One, who was now teaching.

source_sentence: 彼有菩薩名普光清淨月，復有一萬菩薩同號普光清淨月，一一菩薩各與百千萬菩薩以為眷屬，前後圍遶向娑婆世界，所經諸國放雜寶光明莊嚴色，以金寶鈴網彌覆充滿一切虛空，其聲微妙如百佛聲，為見佛故，為供養故，為見月光童子故，為愍德護長者故來至佛所。
translation: There was a bodhisattva named Pūrṇa-prabhāsa-clean-Moon, and there were another 10,000 bodhisattvas with the same name, each of whom was accompanied by a hundred million bodhisattvas as their retinue, who circumambulated the Śrāvastī world, radiated a radiant, adorned color of various treasures in the countries they passed through, filled the entire sky with a web of golden bells, and had a sound as exquisite as the sound of a hundred buddhas, who came to the Buddha because they wanted to see him, because they wanted to make offerings, because they wanted to see the moon-bright boy, and because they wanted to take care of the elderly.

source_sentence: 爾時，西南方過三千大千世界微塵等國土，有世界名金網覆，彼世界有佛，號勝行王如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，今現在說法。
translation: At the time, there was a world named Golden Net in the southwest, 3,000 great one-thousand worlds and dusty lands, and there was a Buddha in that world who was called the Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Trainer, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One, who was now presently teaching.

source_sentence: 彼有菩薩名軟聲自在，復有一萬菩薩同號軟聲自在，各與阿僧祇菩薩以為眷屬，往娑婆世界，所經諸國興寶傘蓋雲，充滿虛空，一一菩薩各將傘蓋，一一寶蓋以真珠為垂露，清淨分明如佛光明，為見佛故，為供養故，為見月光童子故，為愍德護長者故，來至佛所。
translation: There was a bodhisattva named Soft-Sounding Freely, and there were another 10,000 bodhisattvas with the same name, Soft-Sounding Freely, each with an incalculable number of bodhisattvas as their followers, who went to the Śrāvastī world and filled the sky with clouds of jeweled umbrellas from the countries they passed through, and each bodhisattva placed a canopy over each one, each one draped with a true pearl that was as clear and distinct as the Buddha's light, and came to the Buddha because they wanted to see him, because they wanted to make offerings, because they wanted to see the Boy Moonlight, and because they wanted to be kind to the elders and protect them.

source_sentence: 爾時，西北方過三千大千世界微塵等佛剎，有世界名曰普入，佛號無礙月如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，今現在說法。
translation: At the time, there was a world named Pūrṇa in the northwest, 3,000 great one-thousand worlds and dusty buddha bases, and the Buddha was called the Tathāgata of the Unobstructed Moon, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Pūrṇa of Clear Conduct, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Trainer, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One, and he was now presently teaching.

source_sentence: 彼有菩薩名無量音樂聲，復有一萬菩薩同號無量音樂聲，與無量阿僧祇菩薩以為眷屬，恭敬圍遶向娑婆世界，所經諸國一一菩薩，於一一毛孔出阿僧祇音樂之聲，歌頌一切佛法，為見佛故，為供養故，為見月光童子故，為愍德護長者故，來至佛所。
translation: There's a bodhisattva named Amitâbha, and there are another 10,000 bodhisattvas who share the same name, Amitâbha, with measureless numbers of incalculable bodhisattvas as their followers, respectfully circumambulate the Śākya world, and in every pore of every bodhisattva in the countries they pass through, they emit incalculable sounds of music, singing praises of all the Buddha's teachings, in order to see the Buddha, to make offerings, to see the Boy Moonlight, and to pity the elder Takafu, and come to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 爾時，下方過三千大千世界微塵等佛剎，有佛世界名寶蓮華善住，佛號一切眾生世燈如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。
translation: At the time, there was a buddha world below, 3,000 great one-thousand worlds and dusty buddha-halts away, that was called the Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfectly Virtuous, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Trainer, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One for all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 彼有菩薩名普雲德，復有一萬菩薩同號普雲德，一一菩薩各與阿僧祇菩薩以為眷屬，恭敬圍遶向娑婆世界，所經諸國興寶蓮華雲，雨種種無邊色華，莊嚴阿僧祇佛剎，為見佛故，為供養故，為見月光童子故，為愍德護長者故來至佛所。
translation: There was a bodhisattva named Puyun Te, and there were another 10,000 bodhisattvas with the same name, each of whom was accompanied by an incalculable number of bodhisattvas as their retinue, who respectfully circumambulated the Saha world, produced clouds of jeweled lotus flowers in the countries they passed through, rained down flowers of various and limitless colors, and adorned incalculably large buddha bases in order to see the Buddha, make offerings, see the Boy Moonlight, and protect the elders in order to pity them.

source_sentence: 爾時，上方過三千大千世界微塵等佛剎，有佛世界名雜華幢，彼佛號曰雜寶奮迅王如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，今現在說法。
translation: At the time, up above there was a buddha world named Zahua zhang, which was a dusty buddha temple 3,000 great one-thousand worlds away, and that buddha was called Zabao Fenxunwang Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well Gone, Worldly Understanding, Unsurpassed Person, Trainer, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One, and he was now presently teaching.

source_sentence: 彼有菩薩名見者不空，復有一萬菩薩皆同一號，一一菩薩各與阿僧祇菩薩以為眷屬，恭敬圍遶向娑婆世界，所經諸國興栴檀味香雲，雨雜味香，充滿阿僧祇佛剎，為見佛故，為供養故，為見月光童子故，為愍德護長者故，來至佛所。
translation: There's a bodhisattva named Seeing One who's not empty, and there are another 10,000 bodhisattvas all with the same name, each of whom is accompanied by an incalculable number of bodhisattvas as their retinue, who respectfully circumambulate the Śākya world, produce clouds of fragrant sandalwood and rain mixed fragrances in the countries they pass through, and fill incalculably many Buddha-temples in order to see the Buddha, make offerings, see the Boy Moonlight, and take pity on the elders and protect them as they come to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 如是一切方及非方無量勝身菩薩，各從國土佛剎中來，現大威德光明色像而來集會。
translation: Thus, measureless, excellent-bodied bodhisattvas from all directions and non-directions come from the buddha-temples of their lands, displaying images of great majestic and brilliant form, and assemble there.

source_sentence: 從耆闍崛山上至有頂，及三千大千世界悉皆照曜，是諸菩薩莊嚴成就菩薩行，清淨光明照曜心無所住。
translation: From the summit of Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa to the peak of existence and the 3,000 great thousand worlds, they all shine forth, adorned by bodhisattvas who have accomplished the bodhisattva practice and whose minds have no place to abide as their pure light shines forth.

source_sentence: 於不可思議阿僧祇佛剎，能過於諸佛所淨修梵行，增長願智方便智，不可思議三昧常不退轉，若有見聞此諸菩薩及親近者皆悉不空。
translation: At the inconceivable incalculable buddha bases, they purify their religious practice past the buddhas, increase their knowledge of vows and methods, and never falter in inconceivable samādhi, and if they see and hear this, the bodhisattvas and those close to them are all not empty.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊見十方諸大菩薩與阿僧祇菩薩眷屬各從佛剎來集此已，即解加趺坐，為欲往到德護大長者家故。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān saw the great bodhisattvas and their incalculable retinue of bodhisattvas in the ten directions gather here from the buddha bases, and he sat down cross-legged because he wanted to go to the home of the great elder Derviḍa.

source_sentence: 應時三千大千世界六種十八相動：動遍動等遍動，踊遍踊等遍踊，吼遍吼等遍吼，覺遍覺等遍覺，震遍震等遍震，起遍起等遍起。
translation: At the time, six of the eighteen characteristics of the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds moved: moving and moving in equal measure, emitting and emitting in equal measure, roaring and roaring in equal measure, perceiving and perceiving in equal measure, shaking and shaking in equal measure, and rising and rising in equal measure.

source_sentence: 是時，有阿僧祇蓮華，從地踊出，阿僧祇香，阿僧祇光，阿僧祇炎，阿僧祇寶華鬘，阿僧祇摩尼雜寶華莖，阿僧祇摩尼雜寶華臺，阿僧祇毘盧遮那藏，阿僧祇德色不可盡。
translation: At the time, there were incalculable lotus flowers springing from the ground, incalculable fragrance, incalculable light, incalculable heat, incalculable garlands of precious flowers, incalculable stalks of maṇi-jeweled flowers, incalculable stalks of maṇi-jeweled flowers, incalculable stores of vairocana, and incalculable qualities of inexhaustible variety.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊蹋寶華上整理衣服，以神通力化作百千萬億蓮華葉，從地踊出種種雜色，青琉璃德藏為莖，甘露味寶為鬚，正摩尼藏寶為華臺，龍堅栴檀那香光出百千炎。
translation: The Bhagavān then arranged his robes on a jeweled lotus and, with supernormal powers, transformed it into a hundred thousand million million lotus leaves that sprouted out of the ground in a variety of colors, with a blue beryl treasury for the stalk, a nectar-flavored treasure for the beard, a jeweled lotus dais made of the genuine maṇi store, and a hundred thousand rays of light from the fragrance of dragon fruit and sandalwood.

source_sentence: 如是蓮華次第行列，從耆闍崛山至於德護大長者家，寶華遍覆悉皆充滿。
translation: Thus, the lotuses line up in succession, and from Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa to the home of the great elder Takafuku, they are all filled with a pervasive covering of precious flowers.

source_sentence: 復以神力，一切身分普放光明，遍照東方一切佛剎；如是南西北方四維上下一切佛剎，光明照曜亦復如是。
translation: Also, by miraculous power, a universal light radiated from all of their identities, illuminating all the buddha bases in the east, and so did a light that shone from all the buddha bases in the four directions up and down from the south to the west to the north.

source_sentence: 此王舍城一切宮殿、一切屋舍城壁內外街陌垣牆，乃至床下悉皆照曜，一切人民所未曾見。
translation: All of the palaces and halls of this king's residence, all of the walls of the city, the internal and external streets and walls, and even the underside of the beds were all illuminated in a way that had never been seen by the people.

source_sentence: 爾時如來與大菩薩眾、大阿羅漢等，前後圍遶恭敬侍立，遍滿虛空蹋寶蓮華，從耆闍崛山下入王舍城，至德護大長者家。
translation: At the time, the Tathāgata, a large assembly of bodhisattvas and great arhats surrounded by respectful attendants, surrounded by lotus flowers that filled the sky, descended from Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa into Rājagṛha and went to the home of the great elder Takṣa.

source_sentence: 當佛下時，阿耨達多龍王與無量種色龍子其數五百，及無量百千龍王，放無量香雲雨無量香雨，侍從如來。
translation: When the Buddha descended, Anavatapta-nāga-rāja, 500 of his numberless dragons of various colors, and measureless hundreds of thousands of dragon kings released measureless clouds of incense and a rain of incense to attend the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 爾時，四天大王侍引世尊，復雨無量寶雲雨灑散道間，於路兩邊皆作七寶欄楯，種種莊嚴悉皆充滿，如是等一切天王、一切龍王、一切夜叉王、一切揵闥婆王、阿修羅王、迦樓羅王、摩睺羅伽王、緊那羅王、梵天、大梵天、不壞梵天，無量千萬那由他眷屬，恭敬圍遶歌頌讚嘆、實讚嘆、最實讚嘆、不顛倒讚嘆、無二讚嘆、勝讚嘆、最勝讚嘆、歡喜讚嘆、如佛法讚嘆，作如是等讚嘆遍滿虛空。
translation: 爾時，四天大王侍引世尊，復雨無量寶雲雨灑散道間，於路兩邊皆作七寶欄楯，種種莊嚴悉皆充滿，如是等一切天王、一切龍王、一切夜叉王、一切揵闥婆王、阿修羅王、迦樓羅王、摩睺羅伽王、緊那羅王、梵天、大梵天、不壞梵天，無量千萬那由他眷屬，恭敬圍遶歌頌讚嘆、實讚嘆、最實讚嘆、不顛倒讚嘆、無二讚嘆、勝讚嘆、最勝讚嘆、歡喜讚嘆、如佛法讚嘆，作如是等讚嘆遍滿虛空。

source_sentence: 復以如是等恭敬供養，勝供養，最勝供養，阿僧祇供養，出阿僧祇供養。
translation: Again, he makes these kinds of respectful offerings, superior offerings, most superior offerings, incalculable offerings, and outgoing incalculable offerings.

source_sentence: 飛騰虛空隨侍如來，入王舍城，至長者門。
translation: Flying through the sky, he followed the Tathāgata into Rājagṛha and went to the elders' gate.

source_sentence: 四大天王、阿修羅王、夜叉王等，亦從王舍大城步路立侍，至尸利崛多大長者門。
translation: The four great celestial kings, the king of asuras, and the king of nightjars also made their way from the great city of Rājagṛha to the gate of the eldest Śrīgupta.

source_sentence: 爾時月光童子見佛光明及大神通，乃至大地十八相動，生大歡喜心意怡悅，諸根快樂遍身滿足，生歡喜已登七重樓上，合十指掌而向父所，即說偈言：「佛捨加趺坐，　　引發欲來時，　無畏如師子，　　今來已至此。
translation: Seeing the Buddha's radiance and great supernormal powers, up to the eighteen phases of the earth's movement, the Candraprabha boy became greatly elated and happy, and his faculties were satisfied all over his body.

source_sentence: 此來那羅延，　　難壞兩足尊，　破魔及眷屬，　　起彼菩提樹。
translation: Here comes Narayan, a two-legged honored one who's difficult to destroy, destroying Māra and his retinue and raising that bodhi tree.

source_sentence: 此來如金剛，　　一切不能壞，　而能壞一切，　　邪見諸外道。
translation: This is like the adamantine Buddha, who can't destroy anything but destroys everything, even wrong-headed non-Buddhists.

source_sentence: 譬如大力士，　　能壞諸怨敵，　貢高諸煩惱，　　慈悲能散滅。
translation: He's like a powerful man who can destroy enemies, aggrandize afflictions, and compassionately dissipate them.

source_sentence: 此來難破壞，　　摧彼自超勝，　智慧大導師，　　能救濟一切。
translation: He's difficult to destroy, surpasses them on his own, and is a great teacher of wisdom who can save them all.

source_sentence: 此來不可殺，　　諸火所不燒，　如來已離死，　　眾毒不能害。
translation: This is an unkillable being who won't be burned by fire, a being so freed from death that numerous poisons can't harm him.

source_sentence: 此來大丈夫，　　能教大導師，　三界最勝身，　　一切無能及。
translation: This is a great man who teaches a great teacher, the most excellent body in the three realms, which is unsurpassed by all.

source_sentence: 圓肩聰叡者，　　及慈悲聖眾，　一切眾生類，　　最勝無能及。
translation: Perfectly resilient, intelligent, and compassionate, he's the most noble of all sentient beings, unsurpassed in his ability.

source_sentence: 眾色相具足，　　八十種莊嚴，　身光悉照曜，　　調伏淨無漏，　此乘虛空來，　　離罪無取著，　不住雜覺觀，　　常住真實道。
translation: Possessing a multitude of forms, his body is fully radiant, his control is pure and uncontaminated, he comes in space, is free of guilt and attachment, doesn't abide in meditation on mixed feelings, and always abides in the true path.

source_sentence: 此從無盡來，　　能廣說諸法，　不思議法輪，　　種種差別知。
translation: From here comes inexhaustible knowledge that explains the Dharma in detail, doesn't conceive of the Dharma wheel, and knows the various distinctions.

source_sentence: 此來一切智，　　能覺一切法，　十力大悲等，　　安住四辯才。
translation: From this comes omniscience, which recognizes all dharmas, the ten powers, great compassion, and so forth, and the abiding in the four eloquence abilities.

source_sentence: 此來見不空，　　能與眾安隱，　無量億萬劫，　　難聞況得見。
translation: This is the One whose vision isn't empty, who can give peace to all people, and who's difficult to hear and difficult to see for measureless millions of eons.

source_sentence: 此來調伏龍，　　丈夫人師子，　愍眾不思議，　　行成無量劫。
translation: He comes to be a dragon of control, a human lion of a man, a compassionate, inconceivable man, and a practitioner of measureless eons.

source_sentence: 此來自在者，　　眾生無能遮，　大慈悲導師，　　能滿求者願。
translation: This is the one who has mastery, who's unobstructed by sentient beings, and who's a greatly compassionate teacher who fulfills the vows of those who seek him.

source_sentence: 此來善知識，　　住法界最勝，　無邊如虛空，　　一念覺諸法。
translation: This is a good teacher who stands at the top of the Dharma realm, is limitless like space, and perceives all dharmas with a single thought.

source_sentence: 此來離二者，　　到諸法彼岸，　於無相地中，　　最上勝覺來。
translation: Free of the two, he reaches the other shore of all dharmas, and in the stage of signlessness, he's the supreme leader.

source_sentence: 此來能淨施，　　財及法二種，　宿世捨身命，　　憐愍眾生故。
translation: This is the one who purifies gifts, both wealth and dharmas, and who in prior lifetimes sacrificed his body and life to have compassion for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 此來導師者，　　與一切安隱，　無量劫修行，　　為求菩提故。
translation: This is the one who guides, who gives peace to all, who cultivates for measureless eons, and who seeks bodhi for this reason.

source_sentence: 平等大智心，　　法中常勝修，　怨親等無二，　　心淨無分別。
translation: He has a mind of great cognition of equality, always excels in the cultivation of the Dharma, has no duality between enemies and relatives, and has a mind that's pure without discrimination.

source_sentence: 如師子奮迅，　　神力度眾生，　於諸無量剎，　　光明悉遍照，　積劫常讚嘆，　　如來之功德，　一毛不可盡，　　何況一切身。」
translation: Like the lion aroused to anger, his spirit strengthens sentient beings, his light completely shines in measureless bases, and he is constantly praised throughout the eons for the Tathāgata's merit, which is inexhaustible in a single hair, let alone in all bodies."

source_sentence: 爾時，月光童子妹月上，形容端正，聞月光童子說偈讚佛身心歡喜，又見如來光明晃曜，大神通力大地震動心歡喜故，合十指掌向其父前，復說偈言：「如兄月光讚，　　如來諸功德，　一切世間無，　　願父當信受。
translation: At the time, the moon-bright boy sitting on the moon with a correct appearance heard the moon-bright boy praise the Buddha in verse and rejoiced in body and spirit.

source_sentence: 莫信外道語，　　心常懷瞋妬，　於十力生惡，　　惡覺失善心。
translation: Don't believe the words of non-Buddhists, always harboring ill-will in your mind, giving rise to evil in the ten powers, and losing goodness in your mind due to negative perceptions.

source_sentence: 不知佛法故，　　聞說不信受，　為惡失善道，　　對佛不能說。
translation: Because they don't know the Buddha's teaching, they hear it but don't believe it, which creates evil and loses the good path, and they can't explain it to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 受彼邪見言，　　當墮諸惡道，　嫉妬癡濁故，　　則失於善心。
translation: Accepting that wrong view's words, they'll fall into bad destinies, and because of their jealousy and delusion, they'll lose their good mind.

source_sentence: 惡見三毒緣，　　如是貪增長，　顛倒癡心故，　　遠離諸佛法。
translation: Because of the three poisonous causes of bad views and the growth of craving like this, their mistaken and deluded minds are distantly removed from the Buddha's teachings.

source_sentence: 無量千萬劫，　　難得聞佛名，　父應於佛所，　　深生清淨信。
translation: It's difficult to hear the Buddha's name for measureless tens of millions of eons, but a father should go to the Buddha and deeply cultivate pure faith.

source_sentence: 若能稱佛名，　　此人尚難見，　何況見佛身，　　是故父應信。
translation: If he could call the Buddha by name, it would still be difficult for him to see, so how could he see the Buddha's body? Therefore, a father should have faith.

source_sentence: 如所說導師，　　現無量神通，　放無量光炎，　　此人今已來。
translation: Thus, the teacher was described as a person who showed measureless supernormal powers and emitted measureless flashes of light, and now that person has come.

source_sentence: 如上之所說，　　那由他剎動，　無量諸佛子，　　愍眾故來此。
translation: As was explained above, his nayuta-mātra moved, and measureless sons of the Buddha came here out of pity for all of them.

source_sentence: 彼彼十方來，　　難壞如師子，　諸天人龍等，　　歡喜雨眾花。」
translation: They come from ten directions, are indestructible like lions, and gods, humans, and dragons rejoice as they rain down multitudes of flowers."

source_sentence: 爾時，長者女德生見地大動及大神通大光明炎雜色分明，見已歡喜踊躍無量，以其衣裓盛滿雜華，疾至父所合十指掌，以大信心大歡喜心，向父說偈：「父今信外道，　　此心最大惡，　墮在邪惡中，　　常不信佛法。
translation: At the time, the elder woman Desheng saw the ground greatly move and beaming with great superknowledge and a variety of colors, and when she saw that, she rejoiced and leaped for joy, filled her towel with mixed flowers, quickly went to her father, put her palms together with great faith and great joy, and said to him, "Now, my father believes in non-Buddhists, which is the worst thing in his mind, and he's fallen into evil and bad states of constant disbelief in the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 推人入惡趣，　　遮閉人善道，　此常不調伏，　　失佛功德利。
translation: They push people into bad destinies and block the good path for others, which is always unregulated, and they lose the merits and benefits of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 佛如優曇花，　　設行百千劫，　常難得聞名，　　何況能得見。
translation: The Buddha is like the udumbara flower, which, even if it travels for a hundred thousand eons, is always difficult to hear about, so how could it be possible to see it?

source_sentence: 父今信外道，　　起二心請佛，　今已得聞見，　　不應起惡念，　亦莫生濁心，　　及以殺害想，　常生清淨信，　　於佛生歡喜。
translation: Now, my father, a faithful heretic who had two thoughts about inviting the Buddha, has heard and seen him, so don't give rise to bad thoughts, don't become impure, or have thoughts of killing, but always give rise to pure faith and rejoice in the Buddha.

source_sentence: 佛神力難思，　　普覆十方界，　佛子月形面，　　龍神夜叉等，　一切咸恭敬，　　信心禮敬佛，　以曼陀羅華，　　散佛及大眾。
translation: The Buddha's inconceivable power completely covers the worlds of the ten directions, and his disciples' moon-shaped faces and dragons, gods, yakṣas, and others all revere him with faith and reverence.

source_sentence: 佛弟子心喜，　　邪眾心迷濁，　佛日照外道，　　如日蔽螢光，　此勝願大人，　　禮拜難見佛，　見無量眷屬，　　圍遶釋迦尊。
translation: Buddha-disciples rejoice in their hearts, while the minds of wrongdoers are obscured, and the Buddha's sun shines like a sun blocking a fluorescent light.

source_sentence: 勝智清淨智，　　外道不能壞，　蓋雲栴檀雲，　　種種雜莊嚴。」
translation: This excellent knowledge is so pure that it can't be destroyed by non-Buddhists, for it's a cloud of coverings and sandalwood, and it's filled with all kinds of adornments."

source_sentence: 爾時月光弟智堅童子，已曾過去供養諸佛種諸善根，於諸佛所淨修梵行。
translation: It was then that the boy Zhijian, a disciple of Moonlight, had made offerings to the buddhas in the past, planting various good roots and purifying his religious practice in the buddha-places.

source_sentence: 時彼童子，夢中見佛大神通力，從耆闍崛山下欲入王舍城，大地震動即便覺寤，著衣整服疾至門下，生大歡喜還詣父所，而說偈言：「我夢中見佛，　　於此一念間，　從於耆闍崛，　　最大山崗下，　不思議大力，　　菩薩眾圍遶，　各從諸剎來，　　法界差別知。
translation: In a dream, that boy saw the Buddha's great supernormal powers descending from Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa about to enter Rājagṛha. He was shaken and awakened, put on his robe and tidied up, rushed to the gate, became greatly elated, returned to his father, and spoke a verse, saying, "I saw the Buddha in a dream, and during this moment of thought, I came from Gṛdhrakūṭa, down the largest mountain range, surrounded by inconceivable powers, surrounded by a multitude of bodhisattvas, each from a different brake, and knew the difference between the Dharma realms.

source_sentence: 一一菩薩眾，　　無量眾圍遶，　各各地中住，　　彼名不可聞。
translation: One by one, the multitude of bodhisattvas is surrounded by measureless people, each living in a different place, and their names are unheard.

source_sentence: 大智大菩薩，　　名曰離垢光，　為諸佛導師，　　持七寶傘蓋，　彼出妙音聲，　　聞者皆愛樂，　亦復能遍覆，　　十方無量剎，　我見彼世尊，　　能破諸鬪諍。
translation: The great bodhisattva of great wisdom, named Licchavi Light, is a mentor to the buddhas, holding a canopy of seven treasures, and he produces a wonderful voice that's loved by everyone who hears it and can also reach measureless buddhas in the ten directions. I've seen this Bhagavān, who's able to break up disputes.

source_sentence: 從夢覺寤已，　　即便至父所，　父今當信佛，　　棄捨癡外道，　彼令人心惡，　　應當速遠離。
translation: After awakening from a dream, I went to my father, who now believes in the Buddha and abandons deluded non-Buddhists, who are evil in mind and should be quickly avoided.

source_sentence: 設有世界火，　　充滿十方界，　不能燒佛衣，　　何況如來身；　設有諸毒藥，　　充滿百千剎，　不害佛弟子，　　何況於如來。
translation: Suppose there's a world fire that fills the worlds in ten directions but doesn't burn the Buddha's robes, let alone the Tathāgata's body; suppose there's poison that fills a hundred thousand buddhas but doesn't harm the Buddha's disciples, let alone the Tathāgata's body.

source_sentence: 佛於一切毒，　　遠離中第一，　不念毒自消，　　何況念不滅。
translation: The Buddha is the first among those who are free of all poisons, and poison disappears on its own without thought, let alone thought that doesn't cease.

source_sentence: 一切智善調，　　今來王舍城，　不思議菩薩，　　俱到於彼岸。
translation: Well-adjusted in omniscience, he's here in Rājagṛha, an inconceivable bodhisattva, and has reached the other shore together.

source_sentence: 於一切三世，　　或聞或見形，　悉能施安隱，　　是故父當信，　此來見不空，　　父應當供養。
translation: In all three worlds, whether heard or seen in the form, they're all capable of giving peace. Therefore, fathers should believe that this vision is not empty, and fathers should make offerings.

source_sentence: 佛放無量光，　　能除此邪闇，　此光照天人，　　修羅龍夜叉，　及其諸眷屬，　　見者皆不空。
translation: The Buddha emits an infinite amount of light that removes this mistaken darkness, and this light shines on gods and humans, asuras, dragons, yakṣas, and their retinues, all of whom see it and aren't empty.

source_sentence: 一切熱地獄，　　悉皆得清涼，　地獄中眾生，　　除熱心歡喜。
translation: All the hot hells are made cool, and sentient beings in hell are relieved of their fever and rejoice at heart.

source_sentence: 梵天及天主，　　身皆放香雲，　猶如雜綵蓋，　　莊嚴在虛空。
translation: The bodies of the brahma gods and lords of heaven all emit clouds of fragrance like mixed-media canopies, adorned in space.

source_sentence: 此來心無礙，　　如龍勝導師，　能興捨施雲，　　雨種種雜寶，　微妙寶瓔珞，　　旃檀及傘蓋，　遍覆於虛空，　　及十方世界。
translation: With unobstructed mind like a dragon's excellent guide, this being generates clouds of almsgiving, raining down a variety of mixed treasures, subtle jeweled jewelry, sandalwood, and umbrellas that cover the sky and the worlds in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 此來能分別，　　神通到彼岸，　種種差別知，　　能讚嘆諸佛，　無量僧祇天，　　及此城勝人，　聞佛大名號，　　悉來至佛所。
translation: This person is able to discern, has supernormal powers that reach the other shore, knows the various distinctions, praises the buddhas, and brings to the buddha an infinite number of incalculable gods and the victorious people of this city who hear his great name.

source_sentence: 象出歡喜聲，　　師子亦如是，　放蕩諸牛王，　　出聲亦復然，　畜生聞佛名，　　皆發歡喜心，　父是人為勝，　　云何而不信？
translation: The elephant makes a joyful noise, so does the lion, and so does the king of the cattle that roam about, and so does the noise that comes from the animals that hear the Buddha's name, and they all become joyous, for their father is superior to them.

source_sentence: 千萬那由他，　　無量諸音樂，　及寶瓔珞器，　　不鼓而自鳴。
translation: Tens of millions of nayutas, measureless music, and jeweled jeweled vessels sound on their own without drumming.

source_sentence: 無量種畜生，　　於無等十力，　捨離惡毒心，　　生歡喜淨信。
translation: Measureless varieties of animals, with peerless ten powers, abandon malevolent thoughts and develop joyous, pure faith.

source_sentence: 能壞鬪諍魔，　　調伏大寂滅，　忍辱到彼岸，　　慈心廣憐愍，　悲心到彼岸，　　能救諸眾生，　捨種種布施，　　能發菩提心，　父當信釋迦，　　超過世間岸。
translation: He destroys the demon of strife, subdues the great tranquility, reaches the other shore with patience, has a kind heart and extensive pity, reaches the other shore with compassion, saves sentient beings, gives up various kinds of almsgiving, arouses the mind of enlightenment, and makes his father believe in Śākyamuni, surpassing the shore of the world.

source_sentence: 能放十方光，　　眾生離八難，　具彼多神力，　　三世不可量，　遊行如師子，　　智慧到彼岸，　智住如須彌，　　常放於寶光。
translation: He radiates light in ten directions, frees sentient beings from eight difficulties, possesses his many powers, is incalculable in the three worlds, travels like a lion, reaches the other shore with wisdom, abides in wisdom like Sumeru, and always radiates his precious light.

source_sentence: 佛子諸眾等，　　前後而圍遶，　示現諸神通，　　來至王舍城。
translation: Surrounded by a multitude of buddhas and sons, they demonstrate their supernormal powers and come to the city of Rājagṛha.

source_sentence: 種種雜妙寶，　　裝挍而莊嚴，　天龍夜叉眾，　　修羅百千億，　合掌恭敬禮，　　釋迦牟尼尊。
translation: Adorned with a variety of marvelous treasures, they were adorned by a multitude of gods, dragons, nightjars, and a hundred billion sūras, all bowing with their palms together in respect to the Venerable Śākyamuni.

source_sentence: 調伏今在門，　　足蹈門閫時，　盲者得見色，　　聾者得聞聲，　苦者得安樂，　　病者得除愈，　妊身產苦者，　　安隱得免難，　寶藏悉皆得，　　貧者獲富饒，　清淨佛神通，　　一切皆歡喜。
translation: Now that he's at the gate of submission, when his feet tread the path, the blind see forms, the deaf hear sounds, the suffering are made comfortable, the sick are healed, those expecting a baby who's suffering are made secure and freed from hardship, treasures are all obtained, the poor are made prosperous, and the Buddha's supernormal powers are purified, so all rejoice.

source_sentence: 城中一切地，　　眾寶悉遍滿，　可愛寶莊嚴，　　其色甚威曜，　調伏巷中行，　　父當起迎接。
translation: All the grounds in the city are filled with treasures, adorned with lovely jewels and resplendent in their appearance, they walk in the streets under control, and their father rises to greet them.

source_sentence: 廡廊重樓閣，　　男女皆充滿，　以衣盛香花，　　及諸寶瓔珞，　清淨歡喜心，　　以散釋迦牟。
translation: The palace is filled with many mansions and women, and they wear robes filled with flowers and jewelry, purifying their hearts and rejoicing as they scatter Śākyamuni.

source_sentence: 國王名先尼，　　從六萬婇女，　各執諸雜寶，　　供養於如來。
translation: The king, whose name was Xianni, gathered 60,000 concubines, each carrying a variety of treasures, to make offerings to the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 衣盛寶瓔珞，　　及諸妙香花，　亦起歡喜心，　　以散於佛上。
translation: Their robes were covered with precious jewelry and flowers of fine fragrance, and they rejoiced as they scattered them on top of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 智慧人滿巷，　　信樂求功德，　踊躍心歡喜，　　頂禮佛世尊。
translation: Wise men filled the alleyways, faithfully seeking merit, and rejoicing with joy, they paid homage to the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 佛從巷而來，　　百千億眾生，　合掌心歡喜，　　一切皆禮拜，　下遍一切世，　　上至於有頂，　十方一切剎，　　天人雜眾滿，　種種雜類人，　　供養於如來，　一切皆歡喜，　　清淨心禮佛。
translation: As the Buddha comes down the alley, a hundred billion sentient beings clap their hands and rejoice, all venerate him, reaching down to the whole world and up to the top of existence, to all the buddhas in the ten directions, to a multitude of gods and humans, to a variety of people, to the Tathāgata, all rejoice, and venerate the Buddha with a pure heart.

source_sentence: 外道勝論師，　　頂禮世尊足，　以上歡喜心，　　最勝淨信心，　合掌讚嘆佛，　　善哉佛出世，　大智一切智，　　已到於彼岸。
translation: Outsiders and masters of Buddhism bow at the feet of the Bhagavān, rejoicing above, with supreme pure faith, they join their palms and praise the Buddha, "Good is the Buddha who appeared in the world, great in wisdom and omniscience, who has reached the other shore.

source_sentence: 父應生歡喜，　　共往如來所，　取上寶衣服，　　供養於如來。
translation: Fathers should rejoice, go together to the Tathāgata, gather the most precious clothing, and make offerings to the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 除於疑惑心，　　嫉妬諸惡見，　信佛世中勝，　　禮拜牟尼王。
translation: He should rid his mind of doubt and jealousy of bad views, believe in the worldly superiority of the Buddha, and venerate King Muni.

source_sentence: 父今應當知，　　調伏眾生者，　能覆護眾生，　　一切罪惡心，　皆悉能除滅，　　如是大導師，　以憐愍父故，　　今來在門外。
translation: Now, father, you should know that he who disciplines sentient beings and protects them, who removes all kinds of bad and evil thoughts, is thus a great teacher who comes outside the gate because he has pity on his father.

source_sentence: 火坑當自滅，　　出種種蓮花，　優鉢拘物頭，　　波頭分陀利，　諸天及世人，　　龍神等眷屬，　散種種花香，　　充滿遍於地。
translation: The fire pit will cease on its own, and out will emerge various lotus flowers, Upakauśalya, Bhadrapāṇi, gods and humans, dragons and other spirits, and their retinues, scattering the fragrance of various flowers to fill the ground.

source_sentence: 此導師智幢，　　威光難覩見，　一切智知見，　　達到於彼岸，　知三世心業，　　上中下差別，　父當歡喜信，　　難見難聞者。
translation: This guiding wisdom banner, whose radiance is difficult to see, has omniscience and insight, reaches the other shore, knows the mental activities of the three times, distinguishes between higher and middle and lower, and makes fathers rejoice and believe in those who are difficult to see and difficult to hear.

source_sentence: 無量僧祇劫，　　為眾修苦行，　具足諸功德，　　永除一切罪。
translation: For measureless incalculably long eons, he's cultivated ascetic practices for the benefit of all people, perfected all merits, and permanently removed all sins.

source_sentence: 欲修福業者，　　此福田最勝，　憐愍眾生故，　　應現處於世。
translation: Those who want to cultivate meritorious actions, this is the most excellent field of merit, and out of pity for sentient beings, they should be present in the world.

source_sentence: 不為求衣食，　　及顯己智慧，　但以大慈悲，　　憐愍父故來。
translation: He doesn't seek food and clothing or display his own wisdom, but comes with great compassion and pity for his father.

source_sentence: 知父生惡心，　　為彼惡見覆，　欲令得解脫，　　捨離殺害業。
translation: He knows that his father has a bad mind and is hindered by that bad view, and he wants to bring about his liberation by abandoning the act of killing.

source_sentence: 佛於諸眾生，　　一切皆平等，　無有簡擇念，　　亦無怨親想，　如來真智慧，　　永離諸諂曲，　父應生信心，　　尊重而禮敬。
translation: The Buddha is equal among sentient beings, has no ideation of simplicity, harms no enemies, is truly wise, and is free of flattery, so fathers should have faith, respect, and venerate him.

source_sentence: 佛寶世中勝，　　悉吐諸惡見，　父能歡喜信，　　疑網畢竟除。
translation: Among the world's greatest treasures, the Buddha's bad views are all vomited out, so fathers can rejoice and believe, and the web of doubt is ultimately removed.

source_sentence: 以信如來故，　　不墮諸惡道，　佛能淨五根，　　應當速禮敬。
translation: Because of faith in the Tathāgata, he won't fall into bad destinies, and the Buddha purifies the five faculties; he should be quickly venerated.

source_sentence: 三世大導師，　　佛子眾圍遶，　種種地中住，　　無障礙智行。
translation: The great guide of the three worlds, surrounded by sons of the Buddha, lives in various stages, and practices cognition without hindrance.

source_sentence: 此一切智子，　　遶如來照曜，　如日蔽眾星，　　是故應敬禮。」
translation: These sons of omniscience surround the Tathāgata, shining like the sun over the stars; therefore, they should be venerated."

source_sentence: 父見佛神力，　　火坑水盈滿，　種種蓮華出，　　心生大歡喜。
translation: When the father saw the Buddha's miraculous powers, the fire pit filled with water, and various lotus flowers emerged, his heart rejoiced greatly.

source_sentence: 見是諸變已，　　顧看子月光：「汝是我導師，　　憐愍我來生，　我信外道故，　　心常懷毒害。
translation: After seeing these transformations, he looked at his son Moonlight and said, "You're my guide, have compassion for my future lives, and because I believed in non-Buddhists, I always harbored harmful thoughts.

source_sentence: 我今敬信佛，　　悉捨諸惡見，　此兒我知識，　　難可得值遇，　勸我敬信佛，　　轉生大歡喜。」
translation: Now, I'll honor and believe in the Buddha and completely abandon all bad views; this is a son I know who's hard to meet; encourage me to honor and believe in the Buddha, and I'll be greatly delighted when I'm reborn."

source_sentence: 爾時天帝釋，　　及大自在天，　此二大天王，　　為佛莊嚴座；　八十千億天，　　以衣覆寶座，　令一切智坐，　　顯發而照曜。
translation: It was then that Śakra and Mahêśvara, the two great celestial kings, adorned the Buddha's throne, and eight billion gods covered their jeweled seats with robes, causing their seats of omniscience to shine brightly.

source_sentence: 梵天王禮已，　　為佛持寶蓋，　閻浮檀真金，　　雜寶而莊嚴。
translation: After paying homage, the Brahma heavenly kings carried for the Buddha a jeweled canopy of real gold and Jambudvīpa, decorated with various treasures.

source_sentence: 及餘諸天等，　　合掌禮於佛，　散百種雜華，　　及赤旃檀末。
translation: The other gods saluted the Buddha with their palms together, scattering a hundred different kinds of flowers and dust from the red sandalwood.

source_sentence: 長者見佛已，　　其心大歡喜，　八千諸女人，　　得清淨智慧；　有五百童子，　　及五百童女，　見佛神通力，　　皆發菩提心；　無量百千億，　　那由他天子，　見佛神通力，　　得清淨智慧。
translation: When the elder saw the Buddha, his heart rejoiced greatly, and 8,000 women attained pure wisdom; 500 sons and 500 daughters who saw the Buddha's supernormal powers aroused the aspiration for enlightenment; measureless hundreds of billions of gods and sons of Nayuta saw the Buddha's supernormal powers and attained pure wisdom.

source_sentence: 長者懷憂惱，　　心生大慚愧，　即便禮佛足，　　向佛而懺悔：「此食雜毒藥，　　今欲更辦供，　惟願佛世尊，　　留神小停住。」
translation: Embittered, the elder felt a great sense of shame, bowed his head at the Buddha's feet, and confessed to him, "I want to make another offering to this food of mixed poisons, but may the Bhagavān give attention to a small stop."

source_sentence: 如來妙梵聲，　　告德護長者：「如來一切智，　　能却一切毒，　貪瞋癡三種，　　及世間毒藥。
translation: The Tathāgata's marvelous Brahmā voice told the elder Śrīgupta, "The Tathāgata has omniscience that can counteract all poisons, the three kinds of greed, anger, and delusion, and worldly poisons.

source_sentence: 如來真實說，　　我已久遠離。
translation: The Tathāgata truly says, 'I've long since parted with them.'

source_sentence: 貪瞋癡三種，　　及世間毒藥，　離毒清淨法，　　實語皆遠離。
translation: The three kinds of greed, anger, delusion, and worldly poisons are all removed by the true words, which are pure dharmas free of poison.

source_sentence: 貪瞋癡三種，　　及世間毒藥，　離毒清淨僧，　　實語皆遠離。」
translation: The three kinds of greed, anger, delusion, and worldly poisons, as well as the pure saṃgha who are free of poison, are all far removed from the true words."

source_sentence: 佛說此語時，無量諸天出大聲言：「清淨大智，已離眾毒火坑皆滅，家內清淨如本無異，皆是法王威神力故。」
translation: When the Buddha spoke these words, measureless gods raised their voices and said, "The pure great wisdom that has freed itself from all the poisonous fire pits has ceased, and the purity of its household is no different than the original, all because of the authoritative power of the Dharma king."

source_sentence: 時，德護長者即於佛所生大信心，以上妙衣價直百千萬億覆佛身上。
translation: That's when Elder Der Hoo gave rise to great faith in the Buddha and placed a hundred thousand million billion worth of wonderful clothing directly over his body.

source_sentence: 覆已，白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After he covered him, he said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我本愚癡受六師教，今於佛前至心懺悔，由父昔世敬信外道，我順父故作如是罪。
translation: I was originally foolish enough to accept the teaching of the six teachers, but now I wholeheartedly repent before the Buddha because my father respected and believed in non-Buddhists in the past, and I obeyed my father and therefore committed such a sin.

source_sentence: 今因月光令我信佛，我今慇懃至心懺悔，更不作罪，願佛救我。」
translation: Now, because the light of the moon made me believe in the Buddha, I now repent with all my heart and soul, and I hope the Buddha will save me."

source_sentence: 爾時。
translation: It was then that the gods of the form realm again raised their voices.

source_sentence: 色界諸天復出大聲，散天優鉢羅花，波頭摩華，拘物頭華，分陀利華，曼陀羅華，摩訶曼陀羅華，遍滿其地積至于膝。
translation: The gods of the form realm again made a great noise and scattered the heavenly upādhara flowers, the padma flowers, the kuśaṇḍu flowers, the puṇḍarī flowers, the mandāra flowers, and the mahāmandāra flowers, which filled the ground up to their knees.

source_sentence: 長者白佛言：「世尊！
translation: The elder said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我子月光於千萬億劫難可值遇，憐愍我故來生我家，善為我說諸佛功德，於千萬劫恩難可報，復以無價真珠瓔珞而散佛上。」
translation: My son Moonlight was difficult to meet for a thousand million eons, kindly took pity on me and came to live in my house, spoke well for me about the merits of the buddhas, made it difficult to repay kindnesses for a thousand million eons, and distributed priceless real beads and jewelry to the Buddha."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊為德護長者深生信故，以神通力，出百千萬雜寶色雲。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān, because of the faith deeply engendered in Elder Deokso, used his supernormal powers to emit a cloud of a hundred million different colors of jewelry.

source_sentence: 彼時盧紇多輸(譯云赤馬，是神名)、毘桎邏莎(亦是神名)，以種種雜色寶花光明照曜散於佛上，阿僧祇菩薩作無量神通，到於佛前，為欲教化百千萬億諸眾生故。
translation: At the time, Uighursa (which translates as red horse, a god name) and Vaiśravaṇa (also a god name) scattered various multicolored jeweled flowers that shone brightly above the Buddha, and incalculable superknowledges of bodhisattvas arrived before him in order to teach a hundred thousand million sentient beings.

source_sentence: 時德護長者及月光童子并德生童子等，心生歡喜禮敬佛足，至心懺悔，作如是言：「嗚呼奇哉！
translation: At the time, Elder Taku, Child Moonlight, and Child Desheng rejoiced and venerated the Buddha's feet, repented with all their hearts, and said, "Aha! Amazing!

source_sentence: 釋迦如來神通變化不可思議，於百千萬劫難可得見，況生淨信，無量億劫佛世難值。
translation: The unfathomability of the Śākyamuni Tathāgata's miraculous powers and transformations makes it difficult to see them for a hundred million eons, so why wouldn't it be difficult to give rise to pure faith and meet measureless millions of buddhas in the world?

source_sentence: 此兒月光有大智慧，曾見十方無量億佛，遊於一切諸佛世界稽首歸命禮拜於佛，如釋迦如來見十方佛，月光童子亦復如是，能見十方諸佛接足敬禮，於諸佛所聞法不忘。」
translation: This boy Moonlight has great wisdom, has seen measureless millions of buddhas in ten directions, has traveled to all the buddha-worlds, paid homage by bowing his head to the buddhas, and venerated them. Just as the Śākyamuni Tathāgata sees buddhas in ten directions, so does the moonlight boy, who meets the buddhas in ten directions, puts his feet up, venerates them, and doesn't forget the teaching he's heard from the buddhas."

source_sentence: 爾時如來見德護長者家內眷屬男女大小及月光童子，於三寶所已生正信，禮拜讚嘆，廣種善根增益心行，即便微笑如諸佛法，從其面門出無量千萬種雜色光炎，口四十齒，及以四牙，一一皆放無量千萬億光明，青黃赤白紫頗梨色，其光普照東方一切佛剎，如是南西北方四維上下，光明遍照亦復如是，光照已遶身三匝還從頂入。
translation: It was then that the Tathāgata saw the members of Elder Taku's household, his male and female retinues, large and small, and the moon-lit boy, who had developed correct faith in the Three Treasures, venerated and praised them, cultivated good roots and strengthened their mental conduct, and even smiled like the teachings of the buddhas, and from the entrance of his face there emanated an incalculably bright multitude of myriad colors, and from each of the forty teeth of his mouth and four teeth he emitted an incalculably bright multitude of myriad lights, blue, yellow, red, white, purple, and pearly in color, which shone universally at all the buddha bases in the east, and so did the south, west, north, and four counterpoints up and down, and after the light shone around his body three times and entered through the top.

source_sentence: 爾時離攀緣德菩薩，從坐而起，偏袒右肩右膝著地，合掌向佛白言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the Bodhisattva Pratibhāna rose from his seat, bared his right shoulder and knelt on his right knee, put his palms together, and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如來以何因緣作是微笑？
translation: What causes and conditions does the Tathāgata give rise to this smile?

source_sentence: 諸佛不以無因緣而笑。」
translation: The buddhas don't laugh because of a lack of causes."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告離攀緣德菩薩言：「善哉！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the Bodhisattva Pratibhāna, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝能問佛如是因緣，汝已曾於過去無量千萬億劫常問此義，汝今承佛威神力故能問此義。
translation: This is the reason you can ask the Buddha about this, because you've always asked about this meaning in the past for measureless trillions of eons, and now you're able to ask about it because of the Buddha's authority and power.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝今至心諦聽，當為汝說。
translation: Now, listen closely with all your heart, and I will explain it for you.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝今見此德護長者大兒月光童子不？」
translation: Do you now see this great son of Gṛdhrakūṭa, the Boy Moonlight?"

source_sentence: 「唯然，已見。」
translation: "Yes, I have seen it."

source_sentence: 佛言：「此童子者，能令未信眾生令生淨信，未調伏者能令調伏，未成熟者能令成熟，於其父所作善知識。
translation: The Buddha said, "This boy can cause unbelieving sentient beings to develop pure faith, subdue those who haven't been disciplined, and bring to maturity those who haven't matured, and he's a good teacher to his father.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 能以導師法教化其父，安置無量千萬那由他阿僧祇眾生，於佛法中令生信心，必定阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: He teaches his father to be a mentor, places measureless tens of millions of incalculable sentient beings in the Buddha's teaching, and causes them to have faith that they'll surely attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 又此童子，我涅槃後，於未來世護持我法，供養如來受持佛法，安置佛法讚嘆佛法。
translation: Furthermore, this boy, after I pass away, will safeguard my teaching in the future, make offerings to the Tathāgata to maintain the Buddha's teaching, and place the Buddha's teaching in praise of the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 於當來世佛法末時，於閻浮提大隋國內，作大國王名曰大行，能令大隋國內一切眾生，信於佛法種諸善根。
translation: In a future age, at the end of the Buddha's teachings, he'll become the king of a great country called Daxing in the Yambudvīpa region, which will cause all sentient beings in the Yambudvīpa region to believe in the Buddha's teachings and plant good roots.

source_sentence: 「時大行王，以大信心大威德力供養我鉢，於爾數年我鉢當至沙勒國，從爾次第至大隋國，其大行王於佛鉢所大設供養，復能受持一切佛法，亦大書寫大乘方廣經典，無量百千億數，處處安置諸佛法藏，名曰法塔，造作無量百千佛像，及造無量百千佛塔，令無量眾生於佛法中得不退轉得不退信。
translation: "At the time, that great practice king made offerings to my bowl with great faith and great authoritative power, and in a few years my bowl will reach the country of Śālêndra and from there it will go in order to the country of Tuṣita.

source_sentence: 「其王以是供養因緣，於不可稱不可量無邊際不可說諸佛所常得共生，於一切佛剎常作轉輪聖王，常值諸佛。
translation: "Because of these causes and conditions for making offerings, the king has always been born in common with the indescribable, immeasurable, and indescribable buddhas, and he's always the wheel-turning sage king at all the buddha bases and always meets the buddhas.

source_sentence: 於一切佛法僧供養恭敬尊重讚嘆，造立塔寺，一切樂具悉以奉施。
translation: He makes offerings to all the buddhas, Dharma and saṃgha, respects and venerates them, builds stūpas and temples, and presents all the implements of joy as alms.

source_sentence: 經半壽已，棄捨五欲，捨家出家淨修梵行行法供養，閻浮提內一切男女見王出家，亦隨出家淨修梵行。
translation: After half a lifetime, he renounced the five desires, left home, went away to purify his religious practice, and made offerings to the Dharma, and all the men and women in Jambudvīpa who saw that the king had left home also left home to purify their religious practice.

source_sentence: 「此大行王，無量菩薩勝願成就，大神通成就，於不可數劫行菩薩行，一一劫中所化眾生不可稱數，不可說不可量，悉皆安住於佛法中。
translation: "This great king of practices, the accomplishment of measureless bodhisattvas' excellent vows and great supernormal powers, has practiced bodhisattva practices for incalculably long eons, and the sentient beings he has converted in each eon are incalculable, ineffable, and incalculable, all of whom are stable in the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 如一劫中所化眾生，一切劫中亦復如是，此菩薩如是安住，無量無邊不可說眾生，住佛法已於最後身當得作佛，號離垢月不動無障礙大莊嚴如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，出現於世，世界名曰無障礙。
translation: Thus abiding, this bodhisattva thus abides in measureless, limitless, and ineffable sentient beings, and after abiding in the Buddha's teaching he'll attain Buddhahood in his final body, which will be called the immovable, unobstructed, and greatly adorned Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfectly Virtuous, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Tamer of Beings, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One, which appears in the world and is called the Unobstructed World.

source_sentence: 其佛身廣大，無量光明，無量光炎，無量神通力，無量說法，無量徒眾，無量轉法輪，無量身相，教化無量眾生。
translation: That Buddha's body is vast, with measureless light, measureless radiant heat, measureless supernormal powers, measureless teachings, measureless disciples, measureless turning of the Dharma wheel, and measureless characteristics, teaching and transforming measureless sentient beings.

source_sentence: 「彼佛欲入涅槃時，授德護長者記，當得作佛，號無等身如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。
translation: "When that Buddha wants to enter nirvāṇa, he grants Elder Der Hoo the assurance that he'll become a buddha, and he'll be called the Tathāgata with unequalled body, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfect in Knowledge, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Tamer of Beings, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One.

source_sentence: 德護長者家內眷屬，見我神變發菩提心者，皆於彼劫各各名號次第作佛。
translation: The members of Elder Deokou's household who see my miraculous transformation and become enlightened will each be called a buddha in order in that eon.

source_sentence: 天、龍、夜叉、揵闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等，見我於德護長者家現神變時發菩提心者，皆於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提不退轉；於十方界各各剎土、各各名號皆得成佛。
translation: Gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, and nonhumans who see me give rise to the mind of enlightenment during a miraculous transformation at the home of Gṛdhrakūṭa never retrogress, and they all become buddhas in each of the buddha-lands and by each of their names in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 「如是，善男子！
translation: "So it is, good sons!

source_sentence: 此月光童子，已於過去無量阿僧祇劫，教化德護長者。
translation: This boy Moonlight has taught and educated Gṛhapati Tejorā during measureless incalculable eons in the past.

source_sentence: 此童子及德護長者，於當來世常生有佛世界，教化無量眾生。」
translation: In a future life, this boy and Gṛhapati Tejaprabhā will always be born in a world with buddhas and teach measureless sentient beings."

source_sentence: 說此月光童子及德護長者授記因緣時，無量世界地六種動，大光普照，雨眾天華雨眾天寶，雨天瓔珞，雨天寶蓋，雨眾天衣，雨天旃檀末香，雨天沈水香，雨天多伽羅香，雨天優鉢羅華，雨天波頭摩華。
translation: When they explained the causes and conditions for the ordination of this moon-bright boy and Gṛdhrakūṭa, six kinds of earthly movement in measureless worlds were mirrored by a great radiance, which rained down celestial flowers, celestial jewelry, celestial jewelry, celestial lapel, celestial robes, celestial fragrance of sandalwood, celestial fragrance of sinking water, celestial fragrance of tāgara, celestial upādhrakūṭa, and celestial padma flowers.

source_sentence: 諸天音樂出微妙聲，及以諸天歌詠等聲，如此一切皆是佛神通力，亦是月光宿世善根力，為化德護長者及眷屬故，亦化天、龍、夜叉、犍闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽等故。
translation: The music of the gods produces subtle sounds, and the songs and other sounds of the gods are all the result of the Buddha's supernormal powers and the power of the moonlight's long-ago good roots, which transform the elder Śrī Siṃha and his retinue, as well as gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, kaluras, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, and so forth.

source_sentence: 爾時，德護最大長者家人名德，見佛種種神力，亦見天龍八部興大供養，向佛說偈讚嘆佛曰：「南無大智佛，　　釋師子如來，　若能生信心，　　而得大利益。
translation: At the time, the eldest man named Tejorā, whose family was named Rudita, saw the Buddha's various powers and the eight groups of gods and dragons making great offerings to him, and he spoke to the Buddha in verse, praising him, "Homage to the Buddha of great wisdom, the Śākyamuni Tathāgata, if you can give rise to faith, you'll attain great benefit.

source_sentence: 先信於外道，　　而造諸惡業，　今信於世尊，　　得如是大利。
translation: First, faith in a non-Buddhist created bad karma, but now faith in the Bhagavān has resulted in such great benefits.

source_sentence: 見斯不思議，　　其誰不信佛，　如是重罪人，　　佛力故生信。
translation: Seeing this and not thinking about it, who wouldn't believe in the Buddha, such a grave offender, whose faith arises from the Buddha's power?

source_sentence: 一心恭敬信，　　出世勝導師，　無量百千劫，　　不墮諸惡道。
translation: With one heart, respect, and faith, he'll be a better teacher than the world-famous one for measureless hundreds of thousands of eons and won't fall into bad destinies.

source_sentence: 長者造大罪，　　今得淨信心，　以信心因緣，　　如來與授記。
translation: That man committed a great sin, but now he has attained pure faith, and because of the causes and conditions of faith, the Tathāgata has given him a prediction.

source_sentence: 長者自知罪，　　心生大愁惱，　今得信心已，　　得無量福德。
translation: That man knew his own sins and became greatly distressed, but now that he has faith, he's attained measureless merit.

source_sentence: 心中除惡見，　　一切罪皆懺，　於佛世尊所，　　而作清淨心。
translation: He removes bad views from his mind, repents of all sins, and creates a pure mind in the presence of the Buddha, the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 一心信佛故，　　以是信因緣，　來世當作佛，　　不思議法王。
translation: Because of this single-minded faith in the Buddha, and because of the causes and conditions of that faith, I'll become a buddha in the future, not conceiving of the Dharma king.

source_sentence: 初於佛生惡，　　而今深生信，　布施因緣故，　　得清淨業藏。
translation: At first, evil was produced in the Buddha, but now deep faith has arisen, and because of the causes and conditions of generosity, a pure store of karma has been attained.

source_sentence: 於佛生信者，　　一切信此人，　彼人福德聚，　　不可得稱量。」
translation: Those who have faith in the Buddha and all those who believe in him have a stock of merit that's beyond measure."

source_sentence: 爾時，長者德護，頭面禮佛及一切阿羅漢，一切菩薩眾已，次第行百味飲食。
translation: At the time, the elder Der Hoo paid homage to the Buddha, all arhats, and all the bodhisattvas with his head and face, and then he ate and dined a hundred flavors in order.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊說此法已，離攀緣德菩薩、月光童子并長者德護，一切內外眷屬大菩薩眾，及天、龍、夜叉、犍闥婆等一切大眾，皆大歡喜，作禮奉行。
translation: After the Bhagavān explained this teaching, the Candraprabha Bodhisattva, the Candraprabha Boy, and the elder Der Hoo, all the great bodhisattvas who were his inner and outer retinue, and all the gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, and other great people rejoiced greatly and paid homage and handed it down.
